author: EXM7777
text:
here's my updated AI stack:

- nano banana pro for images
- veo 3.1 / sora 2 for video
- kimi K2 thinking for writing
- gemini 3 thinking for deep research

gemini 3 thinking is my daily driver for everything else... this is the best LLM experience i've ever had

hyped for gemini 3 flash
